about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS CONTENT
This is the official walkthrough for Lewd Island.
You can find it in your games local folder as a separate PDF file.

With this walkthrough you can get help with:
- Avoiding certain game over scenarios
- Unlocking every lewd scene
- Unlocking every achievement
- Finding out which choices matter
- Finding how to get to each of different endings

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC includes a Walkthrough which is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9, OpenGL ES 2 or WebGL
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Yosemite 10.10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9, OpenGL ES 2 or WebGL
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Lewd Island - Official Walkthrough

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9, OpenGL ES 2 or WebGL
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
